Title: Three Stories
Writer: Igor Bozhko, Sergey Chetvertkov, Yevgeni Golubenko, Renata Litvinova, Vera Storozheva
Actors: Sergey Makovetskiy, Leonid Kushnir, Zhan Daniel, Renata Litvinova
Plot: A man goes to see his former schoolmate working at a boiler house and persuades him to burn in the furnace the corpse of his communal flat neighbor whom he has just murdered after a quarrel...
